      • clearCache

        public abstract boolean clearCache()
        Clears the Downloader cache.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if otherwise.

      • execute

        public abstract java.lang.String execute(Request request)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Executes the specified request and returns the response String.
        Parameters:
        request - PkRSS Request object containing all necessary parameters.
        Returns:
        Response String to parse
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.io.IOException

      • toSafeUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String toSafeUrl(Request request)
        Parses a request into a safe URL to be used for caching/tracking purposes.

        Note: Returning an invalid URL may cause caching errors and mishandled memory.

        Parameters:
        request - PkRSS Request object containing all necessary parameters.
        Returns:
        Safe URL String to be used for tracking and caching purposes.

      • toUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String toUrl(Request request)
        Parses a request into a URL to be used for execution.
        Parameters:
        request - PkRSS Request object containing all necessary parameters.
        Returns:
        A URL String to load data from.

      • attachInstance

        public final void attachInstance(PkRSS singleton)
        Attaches a PkRSS singleton instance to this Parser for logging purposes.
        Parameters:
        singleton - Singleton instance to attach to this Parser
